jobDescription: Amgen is seeking a Senior Data Scientist to be based in our Thousand Oaks, CA global headquarters, who will report into the Director of Quality Data Science.  The Senior Data Scientist will lead strategic planning and development of data science, natural language processing machine learning, and artificial intelligence capabilities across Quality Data Science. Additionally, the Incumbent will lead cross functional teams on projects and/or programs with aims to systematically integrate data, derive insights, and automate processes.  The focus of Quality Data Science (QDS) is to advance the utilization of data, analytics, artificial intelligence and automation to unlock and leverage Amgen data. QDS aims to accomplish this by supplying solutions that efficiently provide insights and intelligence for the Quality and Operations functions. This includes ensuring data access, application of appropriate analysis methods to unlock information and meaningful visualization and interpretation of information. An untapped resource within quality is the preponderance of data stored as text, as such QDS has made text analytics a primary focus. is preferred) in developing data science/machine learning or other software solutions Amgen is committed to unlocking the potential of biology for patients suffering from serious illnesses by Amgen focuses on areas of high unmet medical need and leverages its expertise to strive for solutions that improve health outcomes and dramatically improve peoples lives.
